alert.note: Alert for Darlington; Dillon; Florence; Marion; Marlboro (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 11:58PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will approach the Florence metro area... At 1157 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bingham to near Lee State Park. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Dillon, Darlington, Timmonsville, Latta, Lamar, Quinby, Lake View, Sellers, Fork, Blue Brick, Zion, Mars Bluff, Brownsville, Lydia, Darlington Raceway, Swift Creek, Cartersville and Oats. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 between mile markers 126 and 141. Interstate 95 in South Carolina near mile marker 146, and between mile markers 153 and 195. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
